attributes.action: make the wearing of Newcastle United shirts abroad an illegal act.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For too long the silent majority have had to put up with the sight of Mutha, Fatha and the rest of those 'salt of the earth' geordie folk wearing every conceivable variation of Toon shirt in every foreign airport, restaurant and world heritage site. 
Get some decent clothes you scruffy benefit cheats.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
